item.title: Surveillance Costs: The NSA's Impact on the Economy, Internet Freedom \& Cybersecurity
item.description: Authors: Kehl, Danielle and Bankston, Kevin and Greene, Robyn and Morgus, Robert Published: July 2014 URL: https://www.newamerica.org/oti/policy-papers/surveillance-costs-the-nsas-impact-on-the-economy-internet-freedom-cybersecurity/ Tags: 2010s Cybersecurity Economic Impact Government Access National Security OTI Personal Privacy Abstract: It has been over a year since The Guardian reported the first story on the National Security Agency’s surveillance programs based on the leaks from former NSA contractor Edward Snowden, yet the national conversation remains largely mired in a simplistic debate over the tradeoffs between national security and individual privacy.
